p: One gram of Salvia officinalis leaves were powdered in a pestle and extracted in a conic tube of 50 mL using 40 mL of 0.08 N hydrochloric acid in 80% methanol. Extraction by shaking was performed at room temperature for 2 h using an Elpan shaker, type 18, 358 S, (Lubawa, Poland). Then the samples were centrifuged at 4500 rpm for 10 min (centrifuge type MPW-350, Warsaw, Poland) and the supernatants were decanted.
